attributes.action: Any Asylum Seeker or Immigrant found guilty of being involved in the riots should be immediately deported without an appeal to stay
attributes.additional_details:
Any asylum seeker or immigrant found guilty in a court of law of being involved in the riots or commiting crime in this country should be deported immediately without an appeal to stay.
As they have shown a disregard for the country that provides for them looks after them and the country is repaid by looting,violence & Crime
